name: Death Bike - Happy Wheels
description:
DEATH BIKE is a rag-doll physics-based game trying to reach the finish line.Expect SUPER COOL RAG-DOLL PHYSICS,TONS of levels（seemly :-D）, which will be updated always! And SHEER MADNESS that you have never seen before!Start the chase for VICTORY NOW!

Features:
- many unique and challenging levels（seemly :-D）
- three addictive world scene
- Deadly obstacles: spikes, wrecking balls, arrows and much more
- Smooth, realistic physics
- Game Center leaderboard support
